Reviews.Title: Well worth it!
Reviews.Author: Andrew Chin
Reviews.Content: light weight, so very easy to point and shoot.  Display is awesome with highly defined resolution and colors.  Zoom is powerful and accurate at details even at 50 feet distance.

Reviews.Title: WOW !
Reviews.Author: John Blayse
Reviews.Content: This is a good package for SX510. It's easy to use and awesome optical zoom. But I Prefer SX500 with the same package because of SX500 has 16.0 MP CMOS and extra function than SX510.Take it:B0096U81BA

Reviews.Title: Great Value. Wi-Fi and Geotagging Capability a Big Plus
Reviews.Author: John Hinchman
Reviews.Content: Great value. The zoom that I needed and wi-fi is a definite plus. The ability to geotag photos using iPhone was great surprise.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: geegee
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my teen son to make videos.  Its very easy to use, pictures are clear.  He's having a good time making videos & taking pictures. Comes with lots of accesories.

Reviews.Title: Great Option for an On-The-Go Camera
Reviews.Author: D. K. Garcia
Reviews.Content: For a small, on-the-go, durable camera, this is a very well designed, feature rich offering.  After researching several options at this price point, this was definitely the best choice for our needs.

Reviews.Title: Sx510 Canon
Reviews.Author: Terry Robitaille
Reviews.Content: We love the small camera . IT takes great picture and easy too use. The caring case and everything that was promised with the camera was perfect . We are very pleased with the seller.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: barbara franklin
Reviews.Content: I haven't had a new camera in a few years so I was due for one.The camera was shipped EXTREMELY fast.  The quality is great, the zoom, macro etc..It is somewhat of a tight squeeze to fit most of the items into the camera bag, but you can easily go buy a bigger bag.The direction are a little confusing for me, I don't consider myself to be tech savvy.Great camera for the price. I did price comparing and Amazon had the cheapest price for the amount of items you received.

Reviews.Title: Soo cool
Reviews.Author: Jeremy
Reviews.Content: I love this!!! I got this for my wife and she has been taking beautiful pictures with it. And it comes with all those cool things too. When I first got the box, I have to say, I thought it was empty. It was really light. But upon opening it  I saw that the product was WELL protected and every thing came brand new and nothing was missing. No damage. As for the camera itself.. It was definitely worth it. My wife loves it and had no problem figuring out the settings. It's not the BESTEST camera in the world but its PERFECT for my wife, who wants to get into photography. I totally recommend.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Lozen27
Reviews.Content: Awesome camera!  I took a picture of the moon and you can see the craters along the edges!(I don't have a very steady hand when zooming)  I would buy it again! It would let me insert the picture in the actual ad.  I hope the photo helps people make a decision!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: ceejay
Reviews.Content: Camera is easy to operate.  I haven't tried the Wifi yet.  The Bundle is well worth the price.  Lots of extras and an excellent camera to boot.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what we needed
Reviews.Author: toni baker
Reviews.Content: Camera is exactly what we needed for our upcoming, very large, family vacation.  The accessories included were such a great bonus.We can't wait to use it!!

Reviews.Title: Nice!
Reviews.Author: Suedelady
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera and you can't beat the price for what your getting. My husband is an avid photographer and swears by canon so this was a great gift for him.  It is compact and totally portable yet very clear and powerful for any type of picture taking!! Highly recommend to anyone that wants an "on the go" camera!

Reviews.Title: Not as good as my old Kodak
Reviews.Author: Msluvtodraw "Msluvtodraw"
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace my old kodak camera to take pictures of my artwork but the quality is much worse. The kodak pictures are sharp and clear while the Canon pictures are slightly blurry. I'm very disappointed with this camera. Now I have a camera with such poor quality that I am stuck using the old one. Also I drew an elk with pastel and with the canon the fur looks green while the kodak color is true to the drawing. A photographer friend tried fooling with it but couldn't get the color to be true to the drawing.

Reviews.Title: Great zoom!
Reviews.Author: Inspired Adult Pianist
Reviews.Content: This camera definitely has the incredible zoom I was looking to acquire.  I have to figure out how to take pictures that aren't blurry though.  If a person moves in anyway during a shoot, they will be blurry.  I haven't read the manual about shutter speeds yet, so perhaps this camera is a gem waiting to be discovered.

Reviews.Title: Great complete package for a starter!
Reviews.Author: Steven H. Poulos "Success Coach"
Reviews.Content: LOVED the complete package combo pack! Includes everything you need to get your camera up and running. If I were to have just bought the camera by itself, I would have had to go out and buy all these accessories separately and probably end up costing me an extra $50!Thanks for the great combo pack of high quality goods to get me started!

Reviews.Title: No Vacation with This Camera!
Reviews.Author: Mary  Schaefer
Reviews.Content: I began on Auto  and was SO disappointed with the washed-out color.  I tried it both inside and outside on a sunny day, as well as inside  with flash in the evening.  I can't tell you how much I wish I hadn't purchased this camera!  I was planning on taking it on a vacation trip, but I will not do so, as I know colors will not be true.

Reviews.Title: I cannot believe they sent me a used one
Reviews.Author: Ivy.
Reviews.Content: The amazon Prime is still very promising. love the 2-day deliverI read a lot of good reviews about this product but when I open the box, it's DEFINITELY a used Camera!There is no protect film on the LED display, no tape on the box, no protect film on the battery. Everything is lose in the box. First time I experience this from Amazon, very very disappointing...I didn't give one star because I still thing this is a good camera~~

Reviews.Title: Lovvvvve this camera….excellent quality cause it is Canon ;)
Reviews.Author: MakeMIneCountry
Reviews.Content: Love this camera. We were looking for a mid-size Canon. We have numerous other digital Canons and we were looking for something in between, this fills the bill perfectly. No Complaints on our part. Get one you will love it just as we do! No regrets!

Reviews.Title: Love it !
Reviews.Author: Travl4fun
Reviews.Content: My husband bought this for me, for our upcoming safari.  I am not literate when it comes to cameras, so when I opened this and started playing with it, I soon realized it's very user friendly ! I love all the gadgets it came with, I really like how light weight it is, since it will be hanging on my neck.  It takes great pictures, was easy to set up, and can't wait to take it on my next trip :)

Reviews.Title: Real Camera
Reviews.Author: Broderick G. Lemons
Reviews.Content: I looooove my camera in every way!!! It shoots and print great pics! The flash may be a bit tricky, but great for semi professional photography.

Reviews.Title: Great Zoom
Reviews.Author: Peter Breyfogle
Reviews.Content: The zoom and the mode selection are great.  I got pictures that have never turned out before.  It is a little bigger then I am used to, but that is the price for the features.

Reviews.Title: very good camera, but delivered with one day delay
Reviews.Author: Ingrid
Reviews.Content: The camera is very good and meet the expectations. Is very good for a advanced compact camera. ABuy with all the acessories, it worth, if you buy them later, separetely they will be expensiver. The product was delivered with one day delay,

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Becca Davis
Reviews.Content: Takes great pictures, easy instructions, small size makes it manageable to carry on my walks. I'm still trying to figure out the wi-fi but I believe the problem is with the Canon website.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased
Reviews.Author: Lillian Caruthers
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with the camera. Takes beautiful pics. Still getting familiar with the features but only wished it came with a owners manual to take with u on ur travels to get to know it better. That's the only thing I dislike of the package other that it's a great camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Angie C.
Reviews.Content: Love the camera.  Takes great pictures.  Was a bit tricky to set us the Wi-Fi but was successful!  Highly Recommend!

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Markie Mar
Reviews.Content: Birthday gift for my daughter. She is taking a photography class next year and needed a camera. She loves it! And the price was great!

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Bruce Tracy
Reviews.Content: My wife really lobes it, i have not been able to use it very much because shre always has it

Reviews.Title: nice equipment reasonably priced
Reviews.Author: Big Mac
Reviews.Content: the camera is great.  The accessories are of light construction, but useful to a degree. i recommend this package highly

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Brynn
Reviews.Content: This camera is very high quality and i love how clear the photos are. I recommend this great product to anyone!!!!

Reviews.Title: why did you choodse this rating?
Reviews.Author: Pat B.
Reviews.Content: the canon bundle is a great bargain - love the camera ! have always bought canon - whether camcorders or cameras

Reviews.Title: Wow
Reviews.Author: Astig 14
Reviews.Content: Arrived earlier than expected. I love the pictures and are very clear. Easy to use, havent tried the wifi yet though. With all the accessories included, I say money's worth.

Reviews.Title: I which it was bigger its nice but too small for me.
Reviews.Author: amy
Reviews.Content: i which it was bigger very small for me, but it is okay for what using, thank you have nice day.

Reviews.Title: Picture must be totally still to come out clear!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Mommy
Reviews.Content: The Zoom works fantastic however if your subject moves or slightly moves the picture is always blurry!!!!!!  This camera is not worth a dime unless your subject is always completely STILL.......PICK ANOTHER CAMERA!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: color of the picture does not meet my expectation
Reviews.Author: menji  wu
Reviews.Content: the camera is all right, but the color of the picture does not meet my expectation. the contrast of the color is not much

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot SX510 HS
Reviews.Author: Timothy E. Adair
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the camera.  It works very well, nice sharp pictures and an awesome zoom.  The only issue I had was that the card reader that came with the kit doesn't work.  There is something bent or broken inside that will not allow you to plug the memory card into it.  It should be noted as well that the WiFi won't work with Vista.  It set right up on my wife's computer that runs 7.  I gave it 4 stars because of the card reader issue.  I like it when everything in a purchase works right our of the box.

Reviews.Title: WiFi needs help.
Reviews.Author: Don Maurer
Reviews.Content: WiFi very difficult if not impossible. Cannon image limits what you can do. Takes too long to focus in. Does take nice pocs.

Reviews.Title: Not what it seems.
Reviews.Author: Dina
Reviews.Content: The item is not what it seems. I would like to have my money back. But they're aren't allowing that.

ProductInfo.Features:
12.1 Megapixel High-Sensitivity CMOS sensor
Canon DIGIC 4 Image Processor
1080p Full HD video
30x Optical Zoom and 24mm Wide-Angle lens
Optical Image Stabilizer
ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot SX510 HS 12.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 30x Optical Zoom and 1080p Full-HD Video Ultimate Bundle With 32GB Secure Digital High Capacity (SDHC) Card, Digpro CompactDeluxe Carrying Case, Extra Battery , Tripod , HDMI Cable, Reader
